name: Pixen Background
summary: A PXBGND file is a background settings file created by Pixen, a macOS-based pixel art editor developed by Furnace Creek Software for creating 2D graphics. It stores background configuration data for a project, such as background colors and transparency grids. PXBGND files do not contain image layers or artwork; instead, they control how the canvas appears behind the artwork during editing.
